pageContext.claim: “They do stories so big on Elizabeth 'Pocahontas' Warren’s crowd sizes, adding many more people than are actually there, and yet my crowds, which are far bigger, get no coverage at all. Fake News!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears jealous of reports of crowds attending Sen. Elizabeth Warren's campaign rallies, sometimes estimated as much as 20,000. He has no basis to claim they are smaller than reported. As we have documented, Trump frequently exaggerates the size of his rally crowds.
